task.name: fixplanets
task.shortdescription: Fixes FIELD and SOURCE table entries based on POINTING table, optionally fixes the UVW coordinates
task.description: Fix FIELD, SOURCE, and UVW for given fields based on pointing table information

param.name: vis
param.description: Name of the input visibility set.

param.name: field
param.description: Fields to operate on. Blank = all.

task.example:
Input Parameters vis --- Name of the input visibility set
field --- field selection string
fixuvw --- recalc uvw coordinate? (default: False)
Example:
fixplanets('uid___A002_X1c6e54_X223.ms', 'Titan', True)
